description.raw:
Fixes building ignition-common from default branch on a 16.04 system. I'm not sure why this hasn't show up before. Has `USE_EXTERNAL_TINYXML2` been set to `OFF` until recently?

```
-- Attempting manual search for tinyxml2
CMake Error at /workspace/ws_ign/install_isolated/ign_cmake/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/FindTINYXML2.cmake:44 (ign_create_imported_target):
  Unknown CMake command "ign_create_imported_target".
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /workspace/ws_ign/install_isolated/ign_cmake/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:145 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:56 (ign_find_package)
```
